thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Southwark (Tate Modern) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great room - Review
thread.title_full: Great room - Review of Premier Inn London Southwark (Tate Modern) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: YUKIYO K
title: Great room - Review
text:
I stayed here for 2 nights. It was about a 7 minutes walk from Southwark station.The hotel room had a double and a sofa, a bathtub.The room was clean. The receptionist was kind and friendly.
There were some supermarkets and coffee shops around the hotel. It was very convenient.I was satisfied with all.I'll visit this hotel next time.
